title: A hybrid approach for power quality event identification in power systems: Elasticnet Regression decomposition and optimized probabilistic neural networks
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Indu Sekhar Samanta, Pravat Kumar Rout, Kunjabihari Swain, Murthy Cherukuri, Subhasis Panda, Mohit Bajaj, Vojtech Blazek, Lukas Prokop, Stanislav Misak
